= Introduction =

This page contains periodic firmware releases binaries.

= YARD-ICE Application =

The application should be loaded ata adress 0x08000000 of the flash memory.

= FPGA Program =

The FPGA program should be loaded at adress 0x08060000 of the flash memory.
